description:
Computes backscatter from SAR input.

Note that backscatter computation may require instrument specific metadata that is tightly coupled to the original SAR products. As a result, this process may only work in combination with loading data from specific collections, not with general data cubes.

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: The source data cube containing SAR input.

parameters.name: coefficient
parameters.description: The backscatter coefficient to compute, either `sigma0` or `gamma0` (the default).

parameters.name: orthorectify
parameters.description:
By default, orthorectification is disabled. Set to `true` to enable orthorectification.

The non-orthorectified products use a simple earth model as provided in the products themselves. This may be sufficient for very flat target areas and is faster to process.

parameters.name: elevation_model
parameters.description: The digital elevation model to use. Set to `null` (the default) to allow the back-end to choose, which will improve portability, but reduce reproducibility.

parameters.name: mask
parameters.description: If set to `true`, a data mask is added to the bands. It indicates which values are valid (1), invalid (0) or contain no-data (null).

parameters.name: contributing_area
parameters.description: If set to `true`, a DEM-based local contributing area band is added. The values are given in square meters.

parameters.name: incidence_angle
parameters.description: If set to `true`, a DEM-based local incidence angle band is added. The values are given in degrees.

parameters.name: ellipsoid_incidence_angle
parameters.description: If set to `true`, a ellipsoidal incidence angle band is added. The values are given in degrees.

parameters.name: gamma_sigma
parameters.description: If set to `true`, a band is added that provides the ratio of the integrated area in the Gamma projection over the integrated area in the Sigma projection (ground).

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: If set to `true`, a band is added that provides the acquisition date for each pixel. Data are day offset to the first observation date (in UTC) as specified in the metadata.

parameters.name: scaling
parameters.description: By default, all values are given in logarithmic decibel (dB) scale. If set to `linear`, the values are given in linear scale. Values are converted from linear to dB using *dB = 10*log₁₀(l)* and vice-versa.

parameters.name: noise_removal
parameters.description: If set to `false`, no noise removal is applied. Defaults to `true`, which removes noise.

returns.description: Backscatter values corresponding to the chosen backscatter coefficient. By default given in decibel (dB), if not specified differently in the parameter `scaling`.

DigitalElevationModelInvalid.message: The digital elevation model specified is either not a DEM or can't be used with the data cube given.
